name: typescript-playcanvas-template
description: A template for running Typescript with PlayCanvas Editor

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.config.js && cross-env UPLOAD=no NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --config webpack.config.js --port 8081 --inline --hot
scripts.https: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.config.js && cross-env UPLOAD=no NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --config webpack.config.js --port 8081 --inline --hot --https

author: Philippe Vaillancourt
